author: Bob Davis
title: Study Shows Big Benefits to Chinese Companies From Joint Ventures with U.S. Firms - Real Time Economics - WSJ
text:
In the trade battle between the U.S. and China, joint ventures play a starring role. The U.S. is threatening China with tariffs on $150 billion of goods mainly because it claims that Beijing forces the U.S. partners to transfer technology unwillingly to Chinese partners—and says that must stop. Now four economists, with remarkable timing, published a study showing […]
